name: Messari
title: io.net's Tory Green on dark compute on Fully Diluted with Messari Research
text:
Synopsis
io.net is exploring the potential of "dark compute" - utilizing untapped computational resources from everyday smart devices to create a decentralized cloud infrastructure that could disrupt traditional cloud computing models.

Key Insights
- Dark compute refers to unused computational power in devices like mobile phones, smart TVs, smart cars, and smart refrigerators
- The concept involves leveraging these widespread smart devices to build a next-generation cloud computing infrastructure
- The approach suggests a decentralized computing (dpin) model that could potentially compete with traditional cloud providers
- This technology could represent a significant innovation in distributed computing and resource utilization
